items.name: DRAFT
desc: DRAFT is a special mode which uses a BSP tree and triangle subdivision for displaying.

items.name: FLAT
desc: forces one normal per flat part.
With FLAT shading, the faces of the object are rendered in a solid color.

items.name: PHONG
desc: With PHONG shading, the normal itself is interpolated to get more realistic colors and light reflections.

items.name: SMOOTH
desc: the point is smooth, the first derivation from the curve discussion view.
With SMOOTH shading, the colors of the lit vertices is interpolated.
